channel.title: Telemetry on Mortar Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Telemetry on Mortar Documentation

item.title: Logging
item.description: Logging is extremely important, that is why Golang standard library have one. However there are better alternatives and it’s up to you to choose the one you want. You will need to wrap it to implement Mortar Logger Interface and you good to go. We already done that for zerolog. One of the goals for Mortar Logger Interface was for it to be flexible, but most importantly it had to include context.
